title: Discrete periodic Toda flow and Gau{\ss} composition of quadratic forms
abstract:
We construct a new and very explicit linearization of the discrete periodic
Toda flow by using Mumford$\text{'}$s algebraic description of the Jacobian of
a hyperelliptic curve, where the addition law is described in terms of the
Gau{\ss} composition law of quadratic forms. Further, we explain how the
periodic box-ball flow fits nicely into this picture as well.
